text: Gravity is released in 2013 British-American space drama science fiction thriller movie. It is a 3D movie. It was co-written, co-produced, co-edited and directed by Alfonso Cuarón. The movie stars Sandra Bullock and George Clooney as surviving astronauts from a space shuttle destroyed by debris. The movie has gotten many awards, and won seven awards in the 86th Academy Awards, with Alfonso Cuarón receiving Best Director. == Other websites == * Category:2013 drama movies Category:2013 3D movies Category:2013 science fiction movies Category:2010s thriller movies Category:2010s American drama movies Category:2010s British drama movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:British science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Alfonso Cuarón
title: Gravity (2013 movie)
